claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older

extracted_evidence.quote: Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older. (1)
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote directly states that Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older, which supports the claim that Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older.

extracted_evidence.quote: Safety and effectiveness of Flublok have not been established in children 3 years to less than 18 years of age.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote clarifies that Flublok is not approved for those under 18, reinforcing that its approved population starts at 18 years of age.

extracted_evidence.quote: HIGHLIGHTS OF PRESCRIBING INFORMATION These highlights do not include all the information needed to use Flublok® safely and effectively. See full prescribing information for Flublok. Flublok (Influenza Vaccine) Injection for Intramuscular Use 2024-2025 Formula ... vaccine. Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older. (1)
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This segment from the official prescribing information reiterates the approved age range for Flublok, confirming it is for adults 18 years and older.
